name: tetris
description: This project packages a playable Tetris clone together with a lightweight reinforcement-learning lab. The web front end still renders the game with vanilla JavaScript and HTML canvas, but the gameplay, rendering, and training logic now live in dedicated ES modules under `web/js/`. The `index.html` file is a slim shell that stitches those modules together, keeping the experience bundler-free while making the codebase easier to navigate.
